ya8.2.1:1.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:2.1: Pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati, nirujjhissati na uppajjissati. Itaresaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati, nirujjhissati ceva uppajjissati ca.
ya8.2.1:3.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:4.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissatīti? No.
ya8.2.1:5.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhatīti? Natthi.
ya8.2.1:6.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati tassa cittaṃ uppannanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:7.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:8.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannañceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:9.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:10.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjati na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:11.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ na uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:12.1: » Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ uppannanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:13.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:14.1: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati. Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannañceva nirujjhati ca.
ya8.2.1:15.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:16.1: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhati na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:17.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:18.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati tassa cittaṃ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:19.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:20.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha ceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:21.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya8.2.1:22.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ na uppajjatīti? Natthi.
ya8.2.1:23.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati tassa cittaṃ uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:24.1: Pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati. Itaresaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati ceva uppajjissati ca.
ya8.2.1:25.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:26.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati ceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:27.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:28.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjati na ca uppajjissati.
ya8.2.1:29.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:30.1: Pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati. Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjissati na ca uppajjati.
ya8.2.1:31.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:32.1: Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati. Itaresaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha ceva uppajjissati ca.
ya8.2.1:33.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:34.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ na uppajjissatīti? Natthi.
ya8.2.1:35.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya8.2.1:36.1: » Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:37.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhittha tassa cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:38.1: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati. Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha ceva nirujjhati ca.
ya8.2.1:39.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
ya8.2.1:40.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhittha tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti? Natthi.
ya8.2.1:41.1: » Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:42.1: Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Itaresaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati ceva nirujjhissati ca.
ya8.2.1:43.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:44.1: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati. Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati ceva nirujjhati ca.
ya8.2.1:45.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissatīti? Nirujjhissati.
ya8.2.1:46.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti? Nirujjhati.
ya8.2.1:47.1: » Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhittha tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:48.1: Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Itaresaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha ceva nirujjhissati ca.
ya8.2.1:49.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:50.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhittha tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
ya8.2.1:51.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
ya8.2.1:52.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhitthāti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:53.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhittha tassa cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:54.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha ceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:55.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhitthāti? Nirujjhittha.
ya8.2.1:56.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhittha tassa cittaṃ na uppajjatīti? Natthi.
ya8.2.1:57.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:58.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:59.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati ceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:60.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:61.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjati na ca nirujjhissati.
ya8.2.1:62.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:63.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:64.1: Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Itaresaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha ceva nirujjhissati ca.
ya8.2.1:65.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:66.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
ya8.2.1:67.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya8.2.1:68.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:69.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:70.1: Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati ceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:71.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:72.1: Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati. Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati ceva nirujjhati ca.
ya8.2.1:73.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:74.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ tassa cittaṃ uppannanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:75.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ uppajjamānanti?
ya8.2.1:76.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ. Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannañceva uppajjamānañca.
ya8.2.1:77.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ tassa cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:78.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjamānaṃ na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:79.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ na uppajjamānanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:80.1: » Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ tassa cittaṃ uppannanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:81.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ nirujjhamānanti?
ya8.2.1:82.1: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ. Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannañceva nirujjhamānañca.
ya8.2.1:83.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ tassa cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:84.1: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhamānaṃ na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:85.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhamānanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:86.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:87.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:88.1: Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Cittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha ceva uppannañca.
ya8.2.1:89.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya8.2.1:90.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ na uppannanti? Natthi.
ya8.2.1:91.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:92.1: Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati. Itaresaṃ cittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannañceva uppajjissati ca.
ya8.2.1:93.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:94.1: Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Cittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati ceva uppannañca.
ya8.2.1:95.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ na uppajjissatīti? Uppajjissati.
ya8.2.1:96.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ na uppannanti? Uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:97.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppajjittha no ca tassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ uppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:98.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati no ca tassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:99.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha no ca tassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjissatīti? Natthi.
ya8.2.1:100.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati no ca tassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya8.2.1:102.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ, no ca uppajjamānaṃ. Uppādakkhaṇe uppannañceva uppajjamānañca.
ya8.2.1:106.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe na uppajjamānaṃ, no ca na uppannaṃ. Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjamānaṃ na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:110.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe na niruddhaṃ, no ca na nirujjhamānaṃ. Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na ceva niruddhaṃ na ca nirujjhamānaṃ.
ya8.2.1:112.1: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, no ca na niruddhaṃ. Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhamānaṃ na ca niruddhaṃ.
ya8.2.1:113.1: » Yassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ tassa cittanti?
ya8.2.1:114.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ, atītaṃ cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇañca vītikkantaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇañca vītikkantaṃ.
ya8.2.1:115.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ tassa cittanti?
ya8.2.1:117.1: » Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, na nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ tassa cittanti?
ya8.2.1:119.1: « Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, na uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ tassa cittanti?
ya8.2.1:120.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ no ca uppādakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ, uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇañca avītikkantaṃ uppādakkhaṇañca avītikkantaṃ.
ya8.2.1:121.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:122.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:123.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhati taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissatīti? No.
ya8.2.1:124.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissati taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhatīti? Natthi.
ya8.2.1:125.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:126.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:127.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannañceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:128.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati taṃ cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:129.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjati na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:130.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:131.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:132.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:133.1: Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati. Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannañceva nirujjhati ca.
ya8.2.1:134.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati taṃ cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:135.1: Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhati na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:136.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:137.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati taṃ cittaṃ uppajjitthāti? No.
ya8.2.1:138.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjittha taṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti? No.
ya8.2.1:139.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:140.1: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha. Bhaṅgakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na ceva uppajjati na ca uppajjittha.

ya8.2.1:190.1: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha. Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhissati na ca uppajjittha.
ya8.2.1:191.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:192.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhati taṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:193.1: Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ na nirujjhati ceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:194.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:195.1: Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati. Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na uppajjati ceva nirujjhati ca.
ya8.2.1:196.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhati taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:197.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:198.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānanti?
ya8.2.1:199.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca taṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ. Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannañceva uppajjamānañca.
ya8.2.1:200.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:201.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjamānaṃ na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:202.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjamānanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:203.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:204.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhamānanti?
ya8.2.1:205.1: Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ. Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannañceva nirujjhamānañca.
ya8.2.1:206.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:207.1: Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhamānaṃ na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:208.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:209.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uppajjitthāti? No.
ya8.2.1:210.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjittha taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti? No.
ya8.2.1:211.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:212.1: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha. Anāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppannaṃ na ca uppajjittha.
ya8.2.1:213.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjittha taṃ cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:214.1: Paccuppannaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Anāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjittha na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:215.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uppajjissatīti? No.
ya8.2.1:216.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti? No.
ya8.2.1:217.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:218.1: Anāgataṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Atītaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppannaṃ na ca uppajjissati.
ya8.2.1:219.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati taṃ cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:220.1: Paccuppannaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Atītaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjissati na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:221.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha no ca taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjissatīti? No.
ya8.2.1:222.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati no ca taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjitthāti? No.
ya8.2.1:223.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:224.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:226.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ, no ca uppajjamānaṃ. Uppādakkhaṇe uppannañceva uppajjamānañca.
ya8.2.1:230.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe na uppajjamānaṃ, no ca na uppannaṃ. Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjamānaṃ na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:234.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe na niruddhaṃ, no ca na nirujjhamānaṃ. Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na ceva niruddhaṃ na ca nirujjhamānaṃ.
ya8.2.1:236.1: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, no ca na niruddhaṃ. Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhamānaṃ na ca niruddhaṃ.
ya8.2.1:237.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ taṃ cittanti?
ya8.2.1:238.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ, atītaṃ cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇañca vītikkantaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇañca vītikkantaṃ.
ya8.2.1:239.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ taṃ cittanti? Atītaṃ cittaṃ.
ya8.2.1:240.1: » Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, na nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ taṃ cittanti?
ya8.2.1:242.1: « Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, na uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ taṃ cittanti?
ya8.2.1:243.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ no ca uppādakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ, uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇañca avītikkantaṃ uppādakkhaṇañca avītikkantaṃ.
ya8.2.1:244.1: » Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:245.1: « Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:246.1: » Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissatīti? No.
ya8.2.1:247.1: « Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhatīti? Natthi.
ya8.2.1:248.1: » Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:249.1: « Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:250.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannañceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:251.1: » Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:252.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjati na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:253.1: « Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjatīti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:254.1: » Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti? Āmantā.
ya8.2.1:255.1: « Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:256.1: Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati. Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannañceva nirujjhati ca.

ya8.2.1:275.1: Anāgataṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Paccuppannaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjittha na ca uppajjissati.

ya8.2.1:277.1: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha. Paccuppannaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjissati na ca uppajjittha.

ya8.2.1:281.1: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha. Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhati na ca nirujjhittha.
ya8.2.1:282.1: « Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:283.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na nirujjhittha, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati. Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhittha na ca nirujjhati.
ya8.2.1:284.1: » Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissatīti? No.
ya8.2.1:285.1: « Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti? No.
ya8.2.1:286.1: » Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:287.1: Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Atītaṃ cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhati na ca nirujjhissati.
ya8.2.1:288.1: « Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:289.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati. Atītaṃ cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhissati na ca nirujjhati.
ya8.2.1:290.1: » Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissatīti? No.
ya8.2.1:291.1: « Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhitthāti? No.
ya8.2.1:292.1: » Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:293.1: Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na nirujjhittha, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhittha na ca nirujjhissati.
ya8.2.1:294.1: « Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhitthāti?
ya8.2.1:295.1: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha. Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhissati na ca nirujjhittha.
ya8.2.1:296.1: (Yassa cittake sakabhāvena niddiṭṭhe, yaṃ cittake ca yassa yaṃ cittake ca ekattena niddiṭṭhe.)
